attributes.action: Stop the muslim march in wooton basset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is a disgrace that extremist's can be allowed to do this i am not against muslim's but if this is allowed then you are allowing them to support terrorism under our noses.

rejection.details: Islam4UK has said it no longer plans to march through Wootton Bassett.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
